page.title: 07 OUR MILKMAN
page.content: Our milk is delivered to our homes five days a week. The dairy that supplies the milk is called the UNIGATE DAIRY. There is another dairy supplying milk to our area called the COOP. The milkman can supply five different types of milk,distinguished by the colour of the tops. They are:- {Silver top}normal pasteurised 23pence {Gold}Channel Island full cream 26p. {Blue/silver striped}_semi-skimmed 23p {Blue top}_ skimmed 23p {Red top}_homogenised 24p Besides milk,the milkman can deliver bread,potatoes,cream.butter,yoghurt, meat,fruit juices and mineral drinks. The milk is delivered by an electric milk float.The milkman delivers to 550 houses and sells about 5500 pints of milk each week.We pay the milkman once a week.
